decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 3 (Sample Materials) of planning permission ref: 23/01699/FUL. Therefore fails to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policy CS8 and Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012

Due to the insufficient information submitted for Condition 6 (Waste and Recycling Facilities) of planning permission ref: 23/01699/FUL the proposal fails to ensure satisfactory refuse facilities in accordance with policy SI17 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Insufficient information has been submitted for Condition 7 (Cycle Parking Facilities) of planning permission ref: 23/01699/FUL. Therefore, the submitted details would fail to ensure that appropriate opportunities to promote sustainable transport are taken up, in accordance with policy T5 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS6 and DM8 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information for the discharge of Condition 8 (Landscape Plan). Therefore, the proposal would fail to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Conditions 3 (Material Samples), 6 (Waste and Recycling Facilities), 7 (Cycle Parking Facilities) and 8 (Landscaping Plan) of planning permission 23/01699/FUL (Erection of a three storey residential building housing 5nos. new dwellings with associated cycle and bin access.)
